fi.tamk.cgeng.engine

Class GameCam

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.cgeng.engine.GameCam

  • public class GameCam
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera that sees given tileMap and objects and paint them relative to cameras position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameCam(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructor that initializes x, y, width and height attributes of Camera
      GameCam(int x, int y, int width, int height, java.util.List<Sprite> objectList)
      Constructor that initializes x, y, width and height attributes of Camera, aswell as List of objects, that this camera sees.

    • Method Summary

      Adds TileMap to camera

      Changes cameras position, so that given Sprite or GameObject is in middle of camera.
